Join a self-defense group: Consider joining a self-defense group or taking a self-defense course. This can provide you with valuable training and support in the event of an emergency.
Install security systems: Install security systems such as cameras, alarms, and motion sensors to deter potential intruders.
Keep a communication device: Keep a communication device such as a phone or radio handy in case of an emergency.
Create a safe space: Create a safe space in your home where you can hide in the event of an emergency.
Develop a bug-out plan: Develop a bug-out plan that includes identifying potential escape routes, knowing where to go, and having a plan in place for getting there.
